message.body: I hope you are having fun today
Hi. I am watch the movie about Hitchcock and knitting a sock. Going to my first day of school at 5:30...
What are you up to?
Oh ok. That is exciting. I'm trying to write my major plan. It's so hard.
Like your for your classes?
Yes, I have to select my classes for the rest of my time here, and have them approved. I feel like I don't have enough time
That does sound hard. Do you want to go over it together?
I will show it to you, but it's really the discretion of the advisor, whether to accept my selections.
Hello. Do you want to outside
Of yoga at around 6;10? It's at 40th and chestnut.
Ok
I'm am so honored to be your friend. I appreciate you. And that's not just the yoga talking.
Thanks, I feel like a real downer. It was good seeing you, I'm glad things are going well for you, you deserve it
You're never a downer. It's just life. And life mostly sucks.
Says the yoga instructor
Are you laying in bed yet? It's great
I just exfoliated. Now I am heading there.
Have you watched girls yet?
Is there a new one? The last one I watched is boys
I haven't seen any. We should do some activity next time we hang, like roller skating in south jersey and then get root beer floats.
I would like that
I hear there's a good rink there but I've never been.
Neither have I, we should check it out sometime. Is this the place with the organ player?
Maybe.
Or we could go to a rodeo or an auction.
Or an estate sale.
Get some match books and creepy masks. I have spring break soon!
Yay! I'm looking for a quilt, a rug or anythng I can resell.
I resold a $5 pocket watch I got with those matchbooks for $65!
